statements: SELECT * FROM player_leaderboards;
SELECT player_name, achievements FROM player_leaderboards WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT * FROM player_leaderboards ORDER BY achievements DESC;
SELECT player_name, achievements FROM player_leaderboards WHERE region = 'Europe' ORDER BY achievements ASC;
SELECT player_name, region, achievements FROM player_leaderboards WHERE achievements > 100;
SELECT * FROM player_leaderboards WHERE achievements > 100 ORDER BY player_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, region FROM player_leaderboards WHERE achievements > 50 AND region = 'EU';
SELECT player_name, achievements FROM player_leaderboards WHERE region = 'NA' ORDER BY achievements DESC;
SELECT player_name, region, achievements FROM player_leaderboards WHERE achievements BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND region IN ('EU', 'ASIA');
SELECT player_name, region, achievements FROM player_leaderboards WHERE region = 'ASIA' AND achievements > 75 ORDER BY achievements DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM player_leaderboard WHERE player_score > 100 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_leaderboard WHERE player_region = 'North America';
SELECT player_name, player_region FROM player_leaderboard WHERE player_score <= 50 ORDER BY player_region ASC;
SELECT SUM(player_score) AS total_score FROM player_leaderboard;
SELECT player_name, player_region, player_score FROM player_leaderboard WHERE player_region = 'Europe' AND player_score BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY player_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_region, player_score FROM player_leaderboard ORDER BY player_score DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT player_name, player_region FROM player_leaderboard WHERE player_region='Asia' AND player_score > 1000
SELECT player_name, player_region, player_score FROM player_leaderboard WHERE player_score BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY player_score ASC
SELECT player_name, player_region, top_player_score FROM player_leaderboard INNER JOIN region_leaderboard ON player_leaderboard.player_id = region_leaderboard.top_player_id WHERE player_score > 2000
SELECT player_name, player_region, player_score FROM player_leaderboard WHERE player_region='Europe' AND player_score > 1500 ORDER BY player_score DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM location;
SELECT player_name, achievements FROM player WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, player_name, achievements FROM player ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT leaderboard_id, rank FROM leaderboard WHERE rank > 3;
SELECT player_name, achievements, region_name FROM player INNER JOIN location ON player.region_id = location.location_id;
SELECT player_name, rank FROM player JOIN leaderboard ON player.player_id = leaderboard.player_id;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE rank < 10 ORDER BY rank DESC;
SELECT player_name, achievements FROM player WHERE region_id = 3 ORDER BY achievements DESC;
SELECT player_name, region_name FROM player JOIN location ON player.region_id = location.location_id WHERE achievements > 500;
SELECT player_id, rank FROM leaderboard WHERE rank BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY rank ASC;
SELECT * FROM region;
SELECT player_name, player_region FROM player ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT leaderboard_id, player_name, region_name, achievement_name, points_earned FROM leaderboard WHERE points_earned > 100 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_points FROM player JOIN achievements ON player.player_id = achievements.achievement_id;
SELECT * FROM leaderboard WHERE region_id = 2 AND achievement_id = 3 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT * FROM region;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_region FROM player WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_points FROM achievements WHERE achievement_points > 50 ORDER BY achievement_points ASC;

SELECT player_name, region_name, achievement_name, points_earned FROM player INNER JOIN leaderboard ON player.player_id = leaderboard.player_id INNER JOIN region ON player.player_region = region.region_id INNER JOIN achievements ON leaderboard.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE region.region_name = 'Europe' ORDER BY points_earned DESC;

SELECT player_name, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM player INNER JOIN leaderboard ON player.player_id = leaderboard.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_points > 100 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name FROM regions;
SELECT player_name, achievements FROM players WHERE achievements > 100;
SELECT city_name FROM cities WHERE region_id = 3;
SELECT player_name, region_name, rank FROM leaderboard ORDER BY rank DESC;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT player_name, achievements FROM players WHERE achievements > 50;
SELECT player_name, achievements FROM players ORDER BY achievements DESC;
SELECT city_name, region_name FROM cities JOIN regions ON cities.region_id = regions.id;
SELECT player_name, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM players JOIN achievements ON players.achievements = achievements.id GROUP BY player_name;
